attributes.additional_details:
I want to start a petition to raise awareness and to get the government to change about easy going life that many prisoners have in prison.
There was a newspaper article on the daily mail website on the 14/08/13 showing two prisoners who had posted on Facebook while in prison a picture of them in their cell with many things based around technology.
While in prison they can earn certain rewards for good behaviour including: longer and more frequent visiting times, flat screen televisions and game consoles in their cells.
I want this petition to achieve national awareness and change.
